name: Alpine
postCreateCommand: echo https://dl-cdn.alpinelinux.org/alpine/edge/community | sudo tee -a /etc/apk/repositories && sudo apk update && sudo apk add curl  python3 py3-pydantic py3-rich py3-yaml py3-httpx py3-typer nfpm && curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && /home/vscode/.local/bin/uv tool install ruff@latest && /home/vscode/.local/bin/uv tool install bump-my-version && sh -c "$(curl --location https://taskfile.dev/install.sh)" -- -d -b ~/.local/bin
